name: GarrysModServerSetup
body:
# GarrysModServerSetup
This will help you get your Debian server working. 
You can install [Virtualbox](https://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Downloads) if you have Windows or some other operating system.

#Requirements
You're gonna need an OK computer. Here's the recommended computer specs for GMod:

OS:  WindowsÂ® 7/8/8.1/10  (You can use Debian for the server.) 
Processor: 2.5 GHz Processor or better 
Memory: 8 GB RAM 
Graphics: 1GB dedicated VRAM or better 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Network: Broadband Internet connection 
Storage: 10 GB available space


Always try to do better than recommended!

# Post-Setup:
This is the setup before we go and install the server.


##Network
This is the part for the NETWORKING.
You're going to need to forward the port 27015 through 27005, both TCP and UDP.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
